AddDiaper add {diaper_load} {diaper_type} diaper
AddBottle add {amount} ounce bottle
GetInventoryDiaper how many diapers size {diaper_size} are left
GetInventoryDiaper how many diapers are left
GetInventoryDiaper how many size {diaper_size} left
GetInventoryDiaper how many {diaper_size} left
GetInventoryBottle how much formula left
GetInventoryBottle how much formula do I have
AddInventoryDiaper add {amount} size {diaper_size} diapers to inventory
AddInventoryDiaper bought {amount} size {diaper_size} diapers
AddInventoryDiaper increase size {diaper_size} by {amount} of diapers
AddInventoryBottle add {amount} ounces of formula to inventory
AddInventoryBottle bought {amount} ounces of formula
AddInventoryBottle increase formula by {amount}
